name: Mirror Image
description:
A girl with otherworldly powers. An army who seeks them. A decision to make. Will you punish her enemies with violence, or show them the mercy they do not deserve? In the end, you must choose what image she will see reflected back in the end.

Mirror Image takes a different approach to the violence in platformers, hinging the game's progression, music, and visuals on how many enemies you kill per level.

Credits:

Conner Shaw - Concept, Music, Level Design, Game Mechanics

Erica Cherrington - Art, Level Design
